creditline: The John and Shirley Nilsen Endowment for Art Acquisition
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: rectangular panel; light yellowish ground decorated with white and dark brown geometric designs--predominately rows of brown and white striped triangles in asymmetrical design; embroidery stitching in light tan with plant fibers along two outer edges, in horizontal and vertical lines, and in triangles and crosses
title: Barkcloth panel
